Name: Chords Enchanter
About the game: From the creators of Scale Enchanter , Chords Enchanter is a music puzzle game intended for those who want to practice chord building in a relaxing and completely imersive environment. Chord Building Made for any music student or master that wants to practice chord building. 140+ Chords Over 140 chords to build from 10 differente chord types. Fully Imersive Environment Feel like in a concert , in an environment full of music elements ! Relaxing and joyful Take your time to build the chords, and if you want to go back to an already built chord, it's just like that . Let's practice together? Wishlist now to keep in touch with the release date!
